title: Graphcrypto
author: Graphcrypto
content: New Giveaway: UniPixelThe rewards: 10 Unibaby NFT and 10¬† Whitelist spots UniDreamers NFTRate: ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©Focus: Ten random participant will receive 1 Unibaby NFT eachTen Random Participants will receive 1 Whitelist spots UniDreamers NFT eachGiveaway Link: Giveaway Bot‚ñ´Ô∏èJoin advertising channel‚ñ´Ô∏èFollow us on Twitter‚ñ´Ô∏èFollow Ad page and Retweet This Tweet and @Tag 3 Friends and HashTag‚ñ´Ô∏èJoin our Discord‚ñ´Ô∏èSubmit your MetaMask (ERC20 or MATIC) wallet address in the Giveaway bot¬† ‚ö†Ô∏èThe list of winners will be published in the Legit Community Bot ‚ö†Ô∏èNote: Giveaway ends 6 June . Distribution of the reward 7 JuneAdditional Information: About UsUniPixel Creator is an image and video creation app designed for the NFT community. As an R&D team that has incubated several multimedia editing apps with a total user base of over 200 million, our vision is to combine video technology with Web3 and community culture to help NFT creators create their works, enhance distribution and fan interaction, launch NFT on the blockchains and incubate influential NFT brands.Based on the mobile creation platform, we will launch UniDreamers NFT as a pass for our App VIP service and a pass for high-value communities. Holders will not only enjoy all the UniPixel VIP services we develop in the future, but can also use the NFT as a pass to participate in the discovery and launch of NFT projects outside the community, dissemination and collaboration with other NFT projects, and get incentives for their contribution. We will use NFT and the App as the bond to build cooperation between NFT communities, and benefit the communities and partners with the airdrop, WL, and sweepstake obtained from the cooperation.Website | Whitepaper | Twitter | DiscordDisclaimer: Please do your own research before joining to any giveaways project, also giveaway¬† is 100% free. Don't send any fee or penny for receiving giveaways tokens. Just join giveaways for free.
